name: Fear Not, LLC
description:
Fear Not believes in the power and efficacy of unencumbered creativity, innovation and entrepreneurship. We believe fear, and the missed opportunities it creates, is a frustrating barrier to big ideas, beautiful creations and valuable risks. When you overcome fear, you own the opportunity to be heard clearly and create change. In a brand. In a company. In the community.
Â 
We create fearless ideas and powerful work across a variety of mediums.
